attributes.action: The People Vs Nike/FA - Lower the Price of The New England Shirt
attributes.additional_details:
Government to force Nike and the FA to lower the cost of the England shirt.

We will not be ripped off by Nike and the FA. £60-£90 for the England World Cup Shirt is frankly disgusting and Nike/FA should be ashamed of trying to take advantage of loyal England fans that want to support our lads in Brazil.

Let's all stand together and boycott the shirt and show Nike WE WILL NOT BE RIPPED OFF. The government should force the hand of the FA and Nike to lower the price of each shirt to reflect the current financial climate.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the FA alone, though the Government is aware of the public's feeling on the matter.
